= The Astral Leak =

The Astral Leak was an event that occured in the year 228 during [[Valerian Ghesh]]'s coup.

== Event ==
A group of Redeemers, or supporters of Valerian, somehow managed to create a rift in the Material Plane.
As a result, large amounts of magical aether flooded into Esoteria.

== Effects ==
The aether infused itself into the plane, amplifying the effects of magic.
